# The `AMDGPUSplitModulePass` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

Splits the module M into N linkable partitions.

The function ModuleCallback is called N times passing each individual partition as the MPart argument.

Definition at line 22 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpusplitmodule-h">AMDGPUSplitModule.h</a>.
